fullplot: Tommy Fawkes wants to be a successful comedian but his Las Vegas debut is a failure. He goes back to Blackpool, UK, where his father, also a comedian started and where he spent the summers of his childhood. He starts to search for a partner, a comic relief, with whom he can be famous.
plot: An unsuccessful comedian uncovers a family secret and learns the true price of letting inherent talent shine.
title: Funny Bones
